title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3050.11 - Authority filing of OCWA-EQ documents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3050.11 - Authority filing of OCWA-EQ documents

State Regulations

The authority shall maintain files in the office of the
authority available for public inspection of all negative declarations, notices
of determinations of significance, notices of completion of draft and final
EIS, notices of public hearing, draft and final EIS's, and decisions it has
prepared or caused to be prepared. Copies of draft and final EIS's shall be
available to the public at charges regularly made by the authority for copies
of other documents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
3050.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
